title: Login Issue!!!!
body: Does anyone have login issue? I can not lock in, it says: the lock in server did not respond....

replies.body:
Are you having any known issues with your internet? I would suggest making sure that your connection is consistent and no dropping of packets.
Open Command prompt and type "ping 8.8.8.8 -t" this should do continuous pings to the google dns server. If there are drop outs there is something wrong with your connection to the internet.

I would suggest restarting your router and computer as well
